explanation: [0-0] This is a split screen. In the upper half, a man with a beard and a blue baseball cap is sitting on the left, and a man with black hair in a dark blue tracksuit is sitting on the right. There is a white caption "T20WC 2022" at the bottom and a pink and white logo in the upper right corner. In the lower half, there are two men in red and blue tracksuits with their backs to the camera. The man on the left has the number 18 printed on the back of his tracksuit, and the man on the right has the number 8. A man in a pink shirt with a staff pass around his neck is standing in the middle. There is a white caption "T20WC 2024" at the top of the screen.

[0-5] First, the black-haired man in the upper half stands up, pats the man wearing the blue baseball cap on the shoulder several times with his hand, and walks away to the right. The man in the baseball cap lowers his head. In the lower half, people walk forward as the camera moves. The man with the number 18 on his back walks to an open door, reaches out his right hand and pats the bearded man sitting on the left on the shoulder. The bearded man buries his face in his arms. The man with 18 on his back walks into the door, followed by the man with 63 on his back who walks to the door and pats the bearded man on the legs with both hands. The bearded man puts his arms down, rests his elbows on his legs, and looks forward. The man with 63 on his back walks to the door, followed by the man with 8 on his back.
